preSubtitle: Check out the details of your new fishbowl:
title: Create a free fishbowl
copyText: Copy and share the fishbowl link with the attendees
accessMsg: Access to the fishbowl will be allowed one hour before the scheduled start time.
joinMemberNote: * Allows you to contact the rest of the attendees

detail.shareTitle:
Well done! Now what?
Share the fishbowl with your friends!
detail.shareSubtitle: Let the conversation flow! Copy and share the link to this fishbowl with the people you want to join the conversation.
detail.mailInfo: ðŸ“© You will receive an email with all the details of the fishbowl you have scheduled.

speaker: Speaker

prejoin.title: Join the room
prejoin.subtitle:
You will enter the room as a listener.
Once inside, if you want to join in the conversation you must occupy a seat.
prejoin.permissions: If in addition to attending the event as a listener you want to actively participate in the conversation, Stooa needs permissions to access your camera and microphone so that others can hear and see you.

waiting: Waiting for host to start the fishbowl
waitingHost: Attendees are waiting for you to start the fishbowl
allowUsers: Allow attendees to join the conversation

introduceModal.title: Give an introduction
introduceModal.description: Your camera will activate so you can say a few words to the attendees before opening the fishbowl. Afterwards you can allow users in the conversation.

endModal.title: End fishbowl
endModal.description: Are you sure you want to terminate this fishbowl?

shareModal.title: Invite more people!
shareModal.description: Let the conversation flow! Copy and share the link of this fishbowl with the people you want to join the session.

fishbowlDescription.shareText: Copy and share the link to invite people to this fishbowl.

modal.title: Why do you want to kick {{userName}}?
modal.description: The user will be kicked and notified, but will be able to come back to the room

options.noParticipating: The user occupies a seat without participating.
options.conductViolation: The user has violated the code of conduct of the community.

permissionsModalDescription: If you want to take a seat in order to say something, Stooa needs permissions to access your microphone so others can hear you.
permissionsModalErrorToast:
It looks like you have blocked the microphone permissions from the browser.
Try reloading the page to continue.

prefishbowl.onBoardingHelp: Don't know how a fishbowl works? Click here
prefishbowl.connectWithUsers: To connect with the people in the room through your social networks, sign up on Stooa.
